meanings.definition: To go on a trip or journey, especially for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: Last summer, we junketed to the beach for a relaxing vacation.
meanings.sent2: They junketed to the mountains for a weekend getaway.
meanings.sent3: The family junketed to the amusement park and had a blast on the rides.
meanings.sent4: The birds junketed across the sky, enjoying the freedom of flight.
meanings.sent5: The children junketed through the park, laughing and playing in the sun.

meanings.definition: A trip or journey, especially one taken for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The junketed to the tropical island was a dream come true for the couple.
meanings.sent2: She planned a junketed to Europe to explore different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The junketed to the chocolate factory was a sweet adventure for the kids.
meanings.sent4: His mind took a junketed into the world of fantasy novels.
meanings.sent5: The junketed to the zoo was filled with excitement and animal encounters.
